thread.title: Anderson Direct & Digital Wins Travel Weekly's Coveted Magellan Awards
thread.title_full: Anderson Direct & Digital Wins Travel Weekly's Coveted Magellan Awards - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Anderson Direct & Digital Wins Travel Weekly's Coveted Magellan Awards
text:
Anderson Direct & Digital
Anderson Direct & Digital Received a Gold and Silver Award for Marketing Excellence
POWAY, Calif. , Oct. 15, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Anderson Direct & Digital ( Anderson ) has been given two awards from Travel Weekly's Magellan Awards program. Anderson was named both the Gold Winner for 7-10 Day Wave #1 in the Cruise Lines Direct Mail category, as well as the Silver Winner for Lead Generation in the Cruise Lines Advertising/Marketing Campaign category. Both of these prestigious awards reflect the campaigns done for Anderson's client, Crystal Cruises.
"Winning these Magellan Awards is a testament to the methodical, tested campaigns we are conducting for our client, Crystal Cruises," said Scott Hopkins , Executive Vice President of Anderson . "The combination of the ROI we are delivering and winning awards like this, which are judged by some of the most accomplished leaders in the industry, really puts into perspective the value we are delivering for our clients."
Anderson will be featured along with the other Magellan Award winners in the upcoming October 19 th issue of Travel Weekly . This is the second consecutive year that Anderson has won in multiple categories for the Magellan Awards, which honors the best in travel.
With decades of expertise in direct, digital and database marketing, Anderson inspires their target audience to take action and deepen their relationship with your brand, while delivering a strong and measurable lifetime value. Services include: marketing strategy, creative services, data intelligence, digital marketing, and media planning as well as direct and production services. Anderson is ranked as one of the top 20 DM agencies in the country by DM News . In both 2013 and 2014, Anderson was voted a Union-Tribune Top Workplace. For more information on Anderson , visit www.andersonDD.com
